resources.string:
Eligibility for donating blood is as follows:

 1] Age should be between 18 and 60 years.
2] You should not be suffering, or had history of cancer.
3] You should not be suffering from any blood clotting disorder, such as haemophilia.

Follow instructions mentioned below:

1] Your weight should be 45kg or above Minimum haemoglobin count should be 12.5gm.
 2] Pulse rate should be between 50 and 100 per minute, without any irregularities.
 3] Blood pressure should be, diastolic 50 to 100 mm Hg and Systolic 100 to 180 mm Hg.
 4] Body temperature should be normal and oral temperature should not exceed 37.5 degree Celsius.
 5] Should not have undergone any treatment for rabies or received Hepatitis B immune globulin within the past one year.
 6] Should not have donated blood within last three months.
 7] Should not have been treated for malaria within last three months.
 8] Should not have undergone any immunization within the past one month.
 9] Should not have undergone any dental work or taken aspirin within last the 72 hours.
 10] Should not have consumed alcohol within the last 9 hours.
 11] If you have any chronic disease that is not mentioned here, you may register, but please inform the patient or the doctor or the hospital staff before you donate blood.
